title: slm.games
author: slm.games
content: Hello!We are looking for someone to create daily posts on our social accounts.This person must have a good sense of humor (good with making/reusing/adapting memes).Some basic skill of Photoshop (for adding text or simple manipulations).This person may be subject for some easy extra tasks, like researching.We don't expect the job will take more than 2-3h a day.Payment up to $100 / week.Send your CVs to : https://t.me/sonic_slmgames

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: slm.games on January 11, 2023, 05:28:39 PMHello!We are looking for someone to create daily posts on our social accounts.This person must have a good sense of humor (good with making/reusing/adapting memes).Some basic skill of Photoshop (for adding text or simple manipulations).This person may be subject for some easy extra tasks, like researching.We don't expect the job will take more than 2-3h a day.Payment up to $100 / week.Send your CVs to : https://t.me/sonic_slmgamesI have sent a message to you by telegram. My telegram is mentioned on my profile also I am posting it here. My telegram is t.me/shasan32 As you are a copper member I think you are not a spammer and I am responding here and on telegram. I hope we will discuss this and would be able to work together.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: That's a nice offer, and I'm good at creating funny post. So I will love to apply for this position

comments.author: plast555
comments.body: looks great to me. request sent.looking forward to your response.

comments.author: jayce
comments.created_time: January 18, 2023, 03:46:07 AMLast edit: May 17, 2023, 06:34:37 PM by jayce
comments.body: Well everyone at the parties said that I'm a funny guy so I just applied. I know the offer was posted a week ago but I checked their twitter, there is no meme post means still no one is hired yet.[img height=200]https://talkimg.com/images/2023/05/17/blob75d101bf1ab42962.png[/img]
